title: Get and Plot a Paper or a User Publication Profile from SemanticScholar
code: ath <- search_author("Van Kinh Nguyen", limit = 10) #> Found 16 potential matches, listing here the 10 authors #> use view_web(this_object, authorID) to open the author url in your browser. #> use get_paper(this_object, authorID) to get a table of publication #> top ten rows #> # A tibble: 10 × 5 #>    name            authorId   affiliations url          most_recent_paper        #>    <chr>           <chr>      <chr>        <chr>        <chr>                    #>  1 K. Nguyen       144006459  ,            https://www… Influence of maternal u… #>  2 V. Kinh Nguyen  1398832498 ,            https://www… An Egyptian HPAI H5N1 i… #>  3 V. Nguyen       2147319167 ,            https://www… 91. Gaps and Opportunit… #>  4 N. Kính         3620223    ,            https://www… Prevalence of Advanced … #>  5 N. V. Kinh      7909277    ,            https://www… Fomento de la elaboraci… #>  6 N. Kinh         52204342   ,            https://www… Evaluate the relationsh… #>  7 K. Van Nguyen   6786539    ,            https://www… An Expanded HIV Care Ca… #>  8 N. van Kinh     134536179  ,            https://www… Effectiveness of contin… #>  9 Kinh Nguyen Van 51926186   ,            https://www… Sofosbuvir-velpatasvir … #> 10 Van Kinh Nguyen 2147319144 ,            https://www… Within-host evolutionar… get_paper(ath, ath$essential$authorId[1]) #> # A tibble: 194 × 5 #>    authorId  paperId                                  url        title      year #>    <chr>     <chr>                                    <chr>      <chr>     <int> #>  1 144006459 dd9cae6f41971fce1947edd36b811d9bb594d33b https://w… Influenc…  2021 #>  2 144006459 027eef3c5965af13e9c82a6ac8cca601996b74c0 https://w… Validati…  2020 #>  3 144006459 2ec4b632b9e1e2e045c7491d3ad03086e8be00ae https://w… Effect o…  2020 #>  4 144006459 85426b1dedc07183574f27e51e703bab1d880937 https://w… Clinical…  2020 #>  5 144006459 922cf3c0cff912c07281be34bc8170bb30a734ac https://w… Virologi…  2020 #>  6 144006459 95f6d25ef4e08f7852f13c787a91dea9bfaa8225 https://w… Survival…  2020 #>  7 144006459 99b6ed39462e849e25ec261817b13cbfb388f138 https://w… Existenc…  2020 #>  8 144006459 a3067275da01f65c00cb66a49db43111e9cce222 https://w… EPIDEMIO…  2020 #>  9 144006459 c3cb349244c2e5100775d1db8e93b0dff4c54fea https://w… Efficacy…  2020 #> 10 144006459 1e47a1712d433c52eb9b067675aa0ab04d115019 https://w… Cardiova…  2019 #> # … with 184 more rows

title: Get and Plot a Paper or a User Publication Profile from SemanticScholar
text: Get author’s papers Plot profile author publication profile contribution Author’s paper papers cited papers. Rate limit allow sending 500 requests/minutes. ask package mature
code: ex_aut <- an_author(level = 'me_only') summary(ex_aut) #> hIndex       :85 #> paperCount   :268 #> citationCount:32770 ex_aut #> # A tibble: 285 × 5 #>    paperId           url                        year citationCount fieldsOfStudy #>    <chr>             <chr>                     <dbl>         <int> <list>        #>  1 116c1cf1650648d8… https://www.semanticscho…  2021             0 <chr [1]>     #>  2 6e5170901d940be6… https://www.semanticscho…  2021             0 <chr [1]>     #>  3 98eb27ccd9f0875e… https://www.semanticscho…  2021             6 <chr [1]>     #>  4 a197dc7522800487… https://www.semanticscho…  2019            21 <chr [1]>     #>  5 e3d5d70005bcc9d3… https://www.semanticscho…  2021             0 <chr [1]>     #>  6 2eab8dd8db899437… https://www.semanticscho…  2020             0 <chr [1]>     #>  7 329b30272c884037… https://www.semanticscho…  2019            39 <chr [1]>     #>  8 4a10dffca6dcce9c… https://www.semanticscho…  2020           379 <chr [1]>     #>  9 4a10dffca6dcce9c… https://www.semanticscho…  2020           379 <chr [1]>     #> 10 fb73b93de3734a99… https://www.semanticscho…  2019           194 <chr [1]>     #> # … with 275 more rows plot(ex_aut) # ex_aut2 <- an_author(level = "me_and_cited_me") # ex_aut2

title: Get and Plot a Paper or a User Publication Profile from SemanticScholar
text: Get citations paper, number citations paper, year, field study. related papers. Example citation profile single paper. extra margin cropped pdfcrop, see document . Profile papers cited work
code: ex_paper <- a_paper() ex_paper #> # A tibble: 111 × 5 #>    paperId           url                        year citationCount fieldsOfStudy #>    <chr>             <chr>                     <int>         <dbl> <list>        #>  1 8dc1e4bac2d0403b… https://www.semanticscho…  2022             0 <chr [1]>     #>  2 03dc6ccb0b04d5eb… https://www.semanticscho…  2020            24 <chr [1]>     #>  3 04eb972bda6e775d… https://www.semanticscho…  2021             4 <chr [1]>     #>  4 0905b384bc98e40c… https://www.semanticscho…  2021             0 <chr [1]>     #>  5 097bd00d48281dfb… https://www.semanticscho…  2020             2 <chr [1]>     #>  6 10247d86d6b9ea32… https://www.semanticscho…  2021             4 <chr [1]>     #>  7 1346d703959399ba… https://www.semanticscho…  2021             0 <chr [1]>     #>  8 148bca569a0d2833… https://www.semanticscho…  2021             0 <chr [1]>     #>  9 15e1af8533cd810e… https://www.semanticscho…  2018             4 <chr [1]>     #> 10 19af8292ff3cc10a… https://www.semanticscho…  2020            44 <chr [1]>     #> # … with 101 more rows plot(ex_paper)

what: Get details of a single paper — a_paper
title: Get details of a single paper — a_paper
text: Get details single paper

title: Get details of a single paper — a_paper
Get details of a single paper — a_paper
text: id semanticscholar following types IDs supported: <sha> - Semantic Scholar ID, e.g. 649def34f8be52c8b66281af98ae884c09aef38b CorpusId:<id> - Semantic Scholar numerical ID, e.g. 215416146 DOI:<doi> -  Digital Object Identifier, e.g. DOI:10.18653/v1/N18-3011 ARXIV:<id> - arXiv.rg, e.g. ARXIV:2106.15928 MAG:<id> - Microsoft Academic Graph, e.g. MAG:112218234 ACL:<id> - Association Computational Linguistics, e.g. ACL:W12-3903 PMID:<id> - PubMed/Medline, e.g. PMID:19872477 PMCID:<id> - PubMed Central, e.g. PMCID:2323736 URL:<url> - URL one sites listed , e.g. URL:https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.15928v1 URLs recognized following sites: semanticscholar.org arxiv.org aclweb.org acm.org biorxiv.org get get - hardcode now, comma-separated list fields returned. following case-sensitive citation fields recognized: contexts intents isInfluential paperId - Always included externalIds url title - Included fields specified abstract venue year referenceCount citationCount influentialCitationCount isOpenAccess fieldsOfStudy authors - 500 returned. include: authorId & name

title: Get details of an_author — an_author
text: Get details an_author

title: Get details of an_author — an_author
Get details of an_author — an_author
text: id authorId return search_author args fields get comma-separated list fields returned. following case-sensitive author fields recognized: authorId - Always included externalIds url name - Included fields specified aliases affiliations homepage paperCount citationCount hIndex papers.paperId - Always included papers.externalIds papers.url papers.title - Included fields specified papers.abstract papers.venue papers.year papers.referenceCount papers.citationCount papers.influentialCitationCount papers.isOpenAccess papers.fieldsOfStudy papers.authors\- include: authorId & name level get author paper's details also details cited papers?
